title: Games industry M & A transactions cumulative value worldwide 2010 to 2016
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Value in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 7 data points.
Overall Value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Value in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Value in million U.S. dollars, about 7757.4 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Value in million U.S. dollars about 81.0 was reached at Year 2010

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Value in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 7 data points.
Overall Value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Value in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.

The line drastically increased by 17.6 times from Year 2010 to 2011,increased by 6.5 times from Year 2012 to 2013,remained stable by 1.7 times from Year 2013 to 2014, and lastly, remained stable by 3.8 times from Year 2015 to 2016.
